mvw.mvw_command: git submodule update --init && autoreconf -i && ./configure --with-oniguruma=builtin && make -j8 && make check
mvw.input_scale: Full repo build and default test suite (jq unit/manual tests)
mvw.success_criteria: exit code 0; make check 9/9 PASS (shtest stubbed in this env so MVW succeeds)

environment.methodology: tutorial.md one-pass profiling; peaks from process-tree measurement (measure_jqlang_jq.sh). Result written only when MVW succeeds (make check exit 0); if run fails, no result is written.

static_triage.notes: C-based JSON processor; autotools build, make check; no GPU, no large assets; make may spawn parallel jobs.

peaks_observed.cpu_utilization_summary: build high (compile -j8), run high (make check recursive)

min_hardware.summary: 2 vCPU / 2 GB RAM / 1 GB disk, no GPU. Raw peaks (rounded up to SKU): build 0.22 GB RAM, run 0.07 GB RAM, disk 0.05 GB.
